attributes.action: A General Election To Find A New Prime Minister From Any Party In 3 Months Time.
attributes.additional_details: It Seems Like The Conservatory Government Has Failed At Their Job At Running The Country And It Should Be Time To Vote Either SNP, Conservatory, Liberal Democrats, UKIP, Labour Or Any Other Party In As The Party To Lead Forward Britian. After All, This Country Is Meant To Be A Democracy So Why Don't We Have A General Election Within The End Of 2016.
attributes.background: I Believe That A Conservatory Government Is Not Just Aloud To Continue On In Office. I Feel Like Britian, As A Democracy, Should Vote For Any Of The Main Party's And Their MP Instead Of A Conservatory Jumping Straight Into Office. I Feel A General Election Is Needed To Find A New Prime Minister.
